action.text: declare @hd_so nvarchar(128), @hd_ngay smalldatetime, @hd_cua nvarchar(128), @hd_ve_viec nvarchar(128), @ma_so_thue nvarchar(128), @ten_van_chuyen nvarchar(128), @hd_van_chuyen nvarchar(128), @pt_van_chuyen nvarchar(128), @xuat_tai_kho nvarchar(128), @nhap_tai_kho nvarchar(128), @nguoi_nhan nvarchar(256) if right(@stt_rec, 3) = 'PXA' begin if exists (select 1 from v84$000000 where stt_rec = @stt_rec) select @hd_so = hd_so, @hd_ngay = hd_ngay, @hd_cua = hd_cua, @hd_ve_viec = hd_ve_viec, @ma_so_thue = ma_so_thue, @ten_van_chuyen = ten_van_chuyen, @hd_van_chuyen = hd_van_chuyen, @pt_van_chuyen = pt_van_chuyen, @xuat_tai_kho = xuat_tai_kho, @nhap_tai_kho = nhap_tai_kho, @nguoi_nhan = nguoi_nhan from v84$000000 where stt_rec = @stt_rec end else begin if exists (select 1 from v85$000000 where stt_rec = @stt_rec) select @hd_so = hd_so, @hd_ngay = hd_ngay, @hd_cua = hd_cua, @hd_ve_viec = hd_ve_viec, @ma_so_thue = ma_so_thue, @ten_van_chuyen = ten_van_chuyen, @hd_van_chuyen = hd_van_chuyen, @pt_van_chuyen = pt_van_chuyen, @xuat_tai_kho = xuat_tai_kho, @nhap_tai_kho = nhap_tai_kho, @nguoi_nhan = nguoi_nhan from v85$000000 where stt_rec = @stt_rec end select isnull(@hd_so, '') as hd_so, @hd_ngay as hd_ngay, isnull(@hd_cua, '') as hd_cua, isnull(@hd_ve_viec,'') as hd_ve_viec, isnull(@ma_so_thue, '') as ma_so_thue, isnull(@ten_van_chuyen, '') as ten_van_chuyen, isnull(@hd_van_chuyen, '') as hd_van_chuyen, isnull(@pt_van_chuyen, '') as pt_van_chuyen, isnull(@xuat_tai_kho, '') as xuat_tai_kho, isnull(@nhap_tai_kho, '') as nhap_tai_kho, isnull(@nguoi_nhan, '') as nguoi_nhan return
